item.title: Introduction to Python
item.description: In this session we will give an intro to the coding platform we use and the basics of python. These basics will be the fundamental building blocks of all of our code!

item.title: Introduction to Schulich Ignite
item.description: In this session we will give an intro to the coding platform we use and Schulich Ignite!

item.title: Review
item.description: This session consists of a kahoot review game, and time to work on projects with your mentors.

item.title: Bonus Topics
item.description: This session introduces students to Collisions.
